member.summary: Number of pages on the process.

member.name: M:Square9.CustomNode.CaptureDocument.GetPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a page file path from the process at a specified index.
member.param: The zero based index of the page.
member.returns: The file path of the page.

member.name: M:Square9.CustomNode.CaptureDocument.GetPages
member.summary: Gets the full list of page file paths from the process.

member.name: M:Square9.CustomNode.CaptureDocument.AddPage(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a file page to the process.
member.param: Path pointing to the page to add to the process.

member.name: M:Square9.CustomNode.CaptureDocument.InsertPage(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Inserts a file page to the process at a specific index.
member.param: Path pointing to the page to insert into the process.
The zero-based index at which the page should be inserted.

member.name: M:Square9.CustomNode.CaptureDocument.MergePages
member.summary: Merges a separated document into a single file on the process.

member.name: M:Square9.CustomNode.CaptureDocument.MovePage(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves a page from one index in the page array to another.
member.param: Index of the page to move.
Destination index of the moving page.

member.name: M:Square9.CustomNode.CaptureDocument.RemovePage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a page from the process at a specified index and deletes it from the file system.
member.param: The zero-based index of the page to remove.

member.name: M:Square9.CustomNode.CaptureDocument.ReplacePage(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces a page at a specific index on the process with another page.
member.param: The zero-based index at which the page should be replaced.
Path pointing to the page to add to the process.

member.name: M:Square9.CustomNode.CaptureDocument.ClearPages
member.summary: Clears all pages from the process.
